name: Enel
effect:
Under the rules of this game, your DON!! deck is 6. 
[Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] If it is your second turn or later, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active, and add up to 4 rested DON!! cards from your DON!! deck. Then, give up to 4 rested DON!! cards to one of your Characters.
